analysis.description:
PixieCrowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1065) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.rate (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#741-742)

RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#180-181) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#195-199)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#208-214)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#221-226)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#231-238)

PixieCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1034-1306) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol)

Reentrancy in PixieCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1138-1141):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1140)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1141)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#856-866) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#865-866)

PixieCrowdsale.hardCap should be constant (/unique_chucks/22/0x29ab5aefbfa2e59da5a898babe2b98e5921c4904.sol#1073)
